text: Grihalakshmi is a 1981 Indian Malayalam film, directed by M. Krishnan Nair. ==Cast== * Madhu as Krishna Menon, Venugopala Menon (double role) * Srividya as Janaki * Subhashini as Sudha * Sankaradi as Manager * Thikkurissi Sukumaran Nair as Kurup * K. Madhu as Doctor * Anandavally as Sukumari * Aryad Gopalakrishnan as Gopalakrishnan * Bahadoor as Raman Pilla * Dhanya as Lakshmi ==References== ==External links== * Category:1981 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films
title: Grihalakshmi (film)
